name: One Man
description:
Created for the 2021 OverNight Game Jam by swordguy, pumpshotty64, and mattie:

Play as ONE man --

-- stranded on ONE planet

-- with ONE jump

-- and ONE (throwable/shootable) ball

We took the theme "You only get one" and made a resource-management puzzle platforming game with 12 levels. Hope you all enjoy! 

Control Reference:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

R - Restart level

Shift + WASD - Push ladders around

LMB - Shoot bouncy ball

Credits:

Programming, Game, and Level design by swordguy & pumpshotty64

Art by mattie
